medical_history.chief_complaint: Fever, chills, and rigors for one day.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was in good health on the morning of presentation and developed sudden shaking chills, pallor of her face and fingers, and lightheadedness around 9:15 PM. Symptoms persisted despite covering with three blankets. She also reported intermittent mild headache. Additionally, she noted left leg pain for the past several weeks, worsened after long days of work and relieved with Aleve and icing.
